title: Bug 13305A suspicious System.out.println in org.eclipse.internal.ui.WorkbenchActionBuilder
description: Build: M5 candidateDescription:The protected method addManualIncrementalBuildAction inorg.eclipse.internal.ui.WorkbenchActionBuilder catches IllegalArgumentExceptionin a few places, and, in the last such catch block, it makes a call toSystem.out.println("build action not found");.Perhaps it should be reviewed.
